entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Papineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 a.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending this afternoon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
